description: Episode number 2 of Series "Drugs: the children are choosing". This film examines the conflicting attitudes to drugs throughout history. Considers the introduction of coffee and tobacco, prohibition of alcohol and use of drugs in ancient cultures. Points out that periods of change often accompany the introduction of new drugs.
